stream_arn.description:
Kinesis Firehose delivery stream ARN where data will be sent to.
Format: `arn:${Partition}:firehose:${Region}:${Account}:deliverystream/${DeliveryStreamName}`.

max_retries.description: Amount of retries to perform when writing a batch.

max_record_size_bytes.description: Number of bytes (as Arrow buffer size) to write before starting a new record.

max_batch_records.description: Number of records allowed in a single batch.

max_batch_size_bytes.description: Number of bytes allowed in a single batch.

Spec.description: Amazon Kinesis Firehose destination plugin spec.
